definitions.text: the activity of looking thoroughly in order to find something or someone

examples: a thorough search of the ledgers revealed nothing

definitions.text: an operation that determines whether one or more of a set of items has a specified property
examples: they wrote a program to do a table lookup
his search for a move that would avoid checkmate was unsuccessful

definitions.text: boarding and inspecting a ship on the high seas
try to locate or discover, or try to establish the existence of
examples: The police are searching for clues
They are searching for the missing man in the entire county
We looked all day and finally found the child in the forest
Look elsewhere for the perfect gift!
the students had to research the history of the Second World War for their history project
He searched for information on his relatives on the web
Scientists are exploring the nature of consciousness
We searched the whole house for the missing keys
